text:
Hi everyone,
I'm using this API: <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/update> to set the value of a custom property for a contact. Afterward, an email will be sent using a workflow. However, I would like to know if there's any possibility to send customized data using this API, as I intend to use it in the email that will be sent from the workflow

Why is this happening?

When creating an email with a custom template, this module with a repeating Text field is injecting visible code. It goes away when view in my mailbox once I send a test. But I don’t understand why it’s showing up in the HubSpot visual editor _at all_.

If I remove `{{ contact.firstname }}`, it stops doing it. But any reference to a contact variable and it comes back.

I set up this HTML+HubL email template and module identically in a second, separate, and unrelated instance of HubSpot and I am not seeing this issue come up at all.

So now I believe there might be some setting turned off or on in my main instance that I’m not aware of?
Both emails in both instances have the Programmable email beta turned on.

Hi everyone,

 to set the value of a custom property for a contact. Afterward, an
email will be sent using a workflow. However, I would like to know if
there's any possibility to send customized data using this API, as I
intend to use it in the email that will be sent from the workflow
